Built deep product knowledge in nutrition and supplements
Balanced full-time work with building Serenergy and college

experience.description: Quit to pursue this full-time. Built a nootropic energy shot company from zero while in college. Worked survival jobs to fund inventory and pay rent - never gave up until forced to.
achievements: Created caffeine + L-theanine nootropic formula (2oz shots, $2/bottle)
Built complete brand: 'Serene Energy' concept, packaging, marketing
Appeared on local television twice to promote the product
Sold thousands of units through events, farmers markets, direct sales
Advanced to NATIONAL BUYER meetings with VitaminShoppe - distribution was within reach
Managed complete supply chain from Pilotworks Brooklyn commercial kitchen
Built EVERYTHING solo: formulation, branding, packaging, sales, marketing, supply chain
Did this while in college full-time AND working survival jobs
experience.note: Business ended in 2019 when Pilotworks (WeWork-style commercial kitchen) shut down, affecting hundreds of food startups. Lost production capability overnight - not the dream, but the means to make it.

experience.description: Nutrition and supplement retail. This is where the Serenergy idea was born - saw the market opportunity firsthand.
